thread.title_full: The Natural Sapphire Company reviewed by Maribel Gonz치lez Barraza

author: Maribel Gonz치lez Barraza
title: Maribel Gonz치lez Barraza
text: We are so pleased and grateful with The Natural Sapphire Company. We were looking for a natural, untreated sapphire ring on a simple setting but we couldn't manage to find anything like that. We also did not know a lot about sapphires but thanks to Caitlyn Perlman we managed to find the perfect ring. She guided us every step of the way, providing us with her comments and suggestions, super patient and efficient. Thanks again!!
